description:
Share of part-time employees among the 15 to under 65
year-olds

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
12211 Microcensus

Definition:
Share of persons in (active) employment regarding themselves
as part-time workers in all persons in (active) employment
(full-time and part-time).


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Share of part-time employees (15 to under 65 y.)
